# countRange

**Instance Property**

The range of values allowed for the sequence’s length.

## Declaration

```swift
var countRange: NSRange { get }
```

## Accessing the constraints

- **valueDescription**: The description that all sequence elements must match.

items.description: The description that all sequence elements must match.
items.name: valueDescription
